text: "Absolutely Fabulous" is a 1994 song by Pet Shop Boys and was released as a single for Comic Relief. It went to number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in New Zealand and Australia, number 18 in Ireland and number 8 in Finland. ==Track listings== * UK and Australian CD single # "Absolutely Fabulous" (7-inch mix) # "Absolutely Fabulous" (Our Tribe Tongue-in-Cheek mix) # "Absolutely Dubulous" # "Absolutely Fabulous" (Dull Soulless Dance Music mix) * Withdrawn UK CD single # "Absolutely Fabulous" (7-inch mix) # "Absolutely Fabulous" (Our Tribe Tongue-in-Cheek mix) # "Absolutely Dubulous" # "This Wheel's on Fire" :This CD was withdrawn due to copyright legalities for "This Wheel's on Fire". * UK 7-inch and cassette single # "Absolutely Fabulous" (7-inch mix) # "Absolutely Fabulous" (Dull Soulless Dance Music mix) * UK 12-inch single :A1. "Absolutely Fabulous" (Our Tribe Tongue-in-Cheek mix) :A2. "Absolutely Dubulous" :B1. "Absolutely Fabulous" (7-inch mix) :B2. "Absolutely Fabulous" (Dull Soulless Dance Music mix) ==References== Category:1994 songs Category:Pet Shop Boys songs
title: Absolutely Fabulous (song)
